org.cloudbus.cloudsim.UtilizationModel

Packages that use UtilizationModel
Package

  • Uses of UtilizationModel in org.cloudbus.cloudsim

    Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim that implement UtilizationModel
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    UtilizationModelFull
    The UtilizationModelFull class is a simple model, according to which a Cloudlet always utilizes a given allocated resource at 100%, all the time.
    class 
    UtilizationModelNull
    The UtilizationModelNull class is a simple model, according to which a Cloudlet always require zero capacity for a given resource all the time.
    class 
    UtilizationModelPlanetLabInMemory
    Defines the resource utilization model based on a PlanetLab datacenter trace file.
    class 
    UtilizationModelStochastic
    Implements a model, according to which a Cloudlet generates random resource utilization every time frame.
    Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim that return UtilizationModel
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    UtilizationModel
    Cloudlet.getUtilizationModelBw()
    Gets the utilization model of bw.
    UtilizationModel
    Cloudlet.getUtilizationModelCpu()
    Gets the utilization model of cpu.
    UtilizationModel
    Cloudlet.getUtilizationModelRam()
    Gets the utilization model of ram.
